statements: SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000
SELECT expense_date, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE team_member_id = 1 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT team_member_id FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE team_member_id = 2 ORDER BY expense_amount ASC
SELECT MAX(expense_amount) AS max_expense, MIN(expense_amount) AS min_expense FROM expenses
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE team_member_id = 5 ORDER BY expense_amount ASC
SELECT expense_id, expense_date, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_description LIKE '%travel%'
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE team_member_id = 3 AND expense_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT team_member_id, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY team_member_id HAVING total_expenses > 5000
SELECT * FROM virtual_team;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM virtual_team WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT team_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expense FROM virtual_team JOIN expenses ON virtual_team.team_id = expenses.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, expense_description, amount FROM virtual_team JOIN expenses ON virtual_team.team_id = expenses.team_id WHERE expense_date = '2023-04-15';
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM virtual_team WHERE team_name = 'Finance Team';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM virtual_team WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT expense_id, team_id, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, COUNT(team_lead) AS lead_count FROM virtual_team GROUP BY team_id HAVING lead_count > 1;
SELECT team_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM virtual_team JOIN expenses ON virtual_team.team_id = expenses.team_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_team_members;
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM virtual_team_members ORDER BY member_name;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT team_name, SUM(total_budget) AS total_budget FROM budget GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT member_id, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM virtual_team_members;
SELECT member_name, team_name FROM virtual_team_members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT budget_id, team_name, total_budget FROM budget WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT member_id, member_name, expense_description, expense_amount FROM virtual_team_members JOIN expenses ON virtual_team_members.member_id = expenses.member_id;

SELECT virtual_team_members.member_name, expenses.expense_description FROM virtual_team_members JOIN expenses ON virtual_team_members.member_id = expenses.member_id WHERE expenses.expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM budget WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM team_expenses WHERE project_name = 'Project X';
SELECT member_name, amount FROM team_members JOIN expenses ON team_members.member_id = expenses.member_id ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_id, member_name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget_amount FROM budget WHERE budget_amount > 10000;
SELECT team_expense_id, project_name, total_expenses FROM team_expenses WHERE total_expenses < 5000 ORDER BY total_expenses ASC;
SELECT member_name, description FROM team_members JOIN expenses ON team_members.member_id = expenses.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT id, name, email FROM team_members WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT year, total_budget FROM budget WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT team_id, year, total_assigned_budget FROM team_budget ORDER BY year;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE id = 1;
SELECT expense_id, date, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT e.expense_id, e.date, m.name FROM expenses e JOIN member_expenses me ON e.expense_id = me.expense_id JOIN team_members m ON me.id = m.id;
SELECT t.team_id, t.year, t.total_assigned_budget, b.total_budget FROM team_budget t JOIN budget b ON t.year = b.year;
